data: John Doe is the co-founder and CEO of Startup.io.
John Doe has led Startup.io from ideation to a Series A funded startup.
John Doe has a background in data science and previously worked at technology giants developing scalable machine learning systems.
John Doe has grown Startup.io to more than 50 employees and secured partnerships with Fortune 500 companies.
John Doe is located in San Francisco, California, United States.
John Doe builds AI-powered analytics platforms at Startup.io.
John Doe is interested in AI startups, a relationship initiated at TechCrunch Disrupt.
